vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωανάν (Rec. Ἰωαννᾶς, -ᾶ), ὁ indecl. (Heb. יוֹחָנָן),
Joanan (cf. Ἰωάνης): Luk.3:37.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27;
son of: Rhesa (G4488);
father of: Joda (G6043)
§ - Joannas, an Israelite
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約亞拿 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "上帝的恩典"
耶穌基督的祖先之一 (路 3:27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约亚拿 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "上帝的恩典"
耶稣基督的祖先之一 (路 3:27)
